Steve Ballmer , Microsoft's Chief Executive, said: I am excited about this partnership with Nokia. Ecosystems thrive when fuelled by speed, innovation and scale. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware and software innovation and a proven ability to execute. The deal will see Nokia's application store integrated with the Microsoft Marketplace.
